name: Little Santa
description:
Player is a little helper of Company named Santa Claus. One day, Santa Claus gives a task to improve the happiness level of a little town. Player need to help local NPCs to achieve their wishes by collecting the corresponding materials.

In the late game, player can unlock more areas in the town, more materials, and able to develop an automation process. Player can interact with people in the town, help them to achieve their dreams, and listen to their stories. Player will experience Santa Claus and achieve the feeling of satisfaction by making dreams come true.

The game is a single-player 2d game.
